channel.title: Please read! please read! please read!
channel.description: okay, now that i have your attention. i was wondering how to change a skill. like slayer. how would i make slayer into dungeoneering i dont want any maps just the skill so when u kill say a monster you get exp for it? if you don't quit understand that il post again. a bit like s slayer task without a task just kill the monster normally.

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

jetboy642:

how do i rename it and change it so it goes up to lv 120 just that skill

for the 120 thing use the search bar been a few topics on it.

And just type in Slayer on a zfilesearcher in your files.
